subject: Informations about the new HS Pro Shifter
description_text:
Hello
I'm Angelo, I'm writing from Italy. I'm interested on the new HS PRO
Shifter, but I would to know something else about the switching from H mode
to Seq mode, that's not explained on the web page of the product.
What does switching between H mode and sequential mode require? Tools as
screwdrivers or other tools are required? It's mandatory to substitute the
H pattern top plate with the sequential top plate? There is an electronic
switch to select, in order to have different comunication channels between
the shifter and the game for the H mode and the Seq mode?
Is there a user guide available for that shifter in order to better
understand how it works?
I currently have also a Plus X pedals on my rig, it will be possible to
manage both pedals and shifter using the same managing software?
Many thanks in advance
Kind Regards
Angelo G.

conversations.body_text: Hi Angelo Guglielmi,    The device supports three switchable modes. We provide matching panel accessories for 6R, 7R, and Sequential modes, with 7R set as the default mode.  After replacing the panel accessory, simply select the corresponding mode in the software, and the device will work correctly without any additional setup.

Thanks for the quick answer. Unfortunately it is not what I'm looking
for... don't want to change the plate any time, sorry.
Kind regards
Angelo
